title: LF Ranked 5v5 Team to join
body:
I Main Mid and Jungle

i rather play with a team i can communicate with when i play rather then try sort through a team thrown together by Riots broken matchmaking system. i am currently S5 but by checking my Lolking profile and recent matches you will see i am never truly behind and when in jungle i tend to assist alot to help lanes carry when needed unless playing a carry jungle. and with mid lanes i rather play zone control or assassins but adapt to Meta quickly in case its needed.

IGN: Zaeus8
